dpns or 40cm long circular knitting needles for sleeves one set of 3 25mm uk10/us3 dpns or 40cm stitch holders and stitch markers long circular knitting needles for sleeves one 3 25mm uk10/us3 circular knitting gauge needle 60cm long for body one 3 75mm uk9/us5 circular knitting needle 22 sts and 28 row to 10cm measured over 60cm and 80cm long for yoke lace pattern stocking stitch using 4mm needles or size needed to achieve stated gauge one 4mm uk8/us6 circular knitting needle 60cm and 80cm long for body and yoke it is essential to work to the stated gauge to ensure success 4 special abbreviations round 21 sl1 k1 psso yfwd sl1 k1 psso k1 k2tog yfwd k2tog k1 8 sts when working short row work as follows round 23 k2 yfwd sl1 k2tog psso yfwd k3 wrap and turn w&t on knit row round 25 sl1 k1 psso k1 yfwd sl1 k1 psso take yarn between needles to front of work k2tog k1 6 sts slip the next st purlwise from the lh to rh round 27 k1 yfwd sl1 k2tog psso yfwd k2 needle take yarn between needles to back of work slip the st back to the lh needle round 29 k2 yfwd sl1 k1 psso k2 turn your work round 30 knit wrap and turn w&t on purl row take yarn between needles to back of for 3rd and 4th sizes work slip the next st purlwise from lh round 1 k6 yfwd sl1 k1 psso k6 14 sts to rh needle take yarn between needles to front of work slip the st back to lh round 2 and all even-numbered rounds knit needle turn your work round 3 k4 k2tog yfwd k1 yfwd sl1 k1 knit stitch and wrap together on a knit row psso k5 insert rh needle up through the wrap then round 5 yfwd sl1 k1 psso k2 k2tog into the st knit stitch and wrap together yfwd k1 twice purl stitch and wrap together on a purl row round 7 k1 yfwd sl1 k1 psso k3 yfwd sl1 insert rh needle into wrap from back of k1 psso k2 k2tog yfwd k2 work lift wrap onto lh needle purl st and round 9 sl1 k1 psso yfwd sl1 k1 psso k5 wrap together k2tog yfwd k2tog k1 12 sts round 11 yfwd sl1 k1 psso twice k3 k2tog yfwd twice k1 round 13 k1
